unnormalised: Okay, folks, grab your chai and get ready for the piping hot gossip! Bollywood's been buzzing louder than Mumbai traffic lately, and you know I've got the inside scoop.
normalised: Okay, folks, grab your chai and get ready for the piping hot gossip! Bollywood's been buzzing louder than Mumbai traffic lately, and you know I've got the inside scoop.

unnormalised: First off, whispers are swirling around Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor. Sources close to the couple (ahem, my chachi's tailor's cousin's driver) say they might be renewing their vows in a super-secret ceremony near Jaipur. Apparently, Ranbir wants something “smaller and more intimate” than their original wedding. Wonder if Karan Johar will manage to keep it low-key, knowing his love for drama! Remember his antics during the promotions of “Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani”? Absolute chaos, but entertaining chaos, I must admit!

unnormalised: Then there's Ranveer Singh. Word on the street (or should I say, Bandra's streets) is that he's been taking intense dance classes at Shiamak Davar's Institute. Preparing for a role, or maybe just trying to impress Deepika with some new moves? My bet's on a role. Knowing Ranveer, it's probably something completely over-the-top and fabulous.

unnormalised: And speaking of fabulous, apparently Priyanka Chopra Jonas was spotted at a Manish Malhotra store last week. Rumours suggest she is sourcing outfits for a lavish Diwali party in LA this year. Expect fireworks, folks – both literally and figuratively!

unnormalised: But the biggest shocker? Rumor has it that Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal are considering adopting a puppy from a shelter in Delhi. How adorable is that?! We love a celeb couple using their influence for good.

unnormalised: Finally, there is a buzz regarding Sara Ali Khan and Shubman Gill. The duo were spotted having dinner at a restaurant in Ahmedabad after a cricket match. Are they back together? Are they just friends? The suspense is killing me!
